basics.name: Alvaro Capaceta Magallanes
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer with a Backend focus, specializing in web development and dedicated to creating impactful and functional digital experiences
basics.summary: Passionate about technology and dedicated to programming, I have a strong commitment to continuous learning and staying updated with the latest emerging technologies in the field. I have worked in startup environments, accelerating the development of startups and collaborating on client projects. My proactive problem-solving skills ensure optimal functionality, stunning design, and exceptional user experiences. My goal is to make people's lives easier and more exciting through digital innovation.

work.name: Voltz
work.summary: Development of a quoting and e-commerce tool for the sale of electrical materials, I collaborated on the design and implementation of various e-commerce views and interfaces. Additionally, I developed TypeScript scripts to manage our Firebase database at scale. I also designed APIs for comprehensive data collection analytics, implemented artificial intelligence features into a chatbot, and successfully redesigned the checkout process to significantly increase sales conversion rates.

work.name: Luthor Solutions
work.summary: Developed scalable APIs with NestJS, integrating Neo4J, SQL, Firebase, and SQLite databases. Created microservices for mailing, authentication, reporting, and storage using Firebase and Cloudflare R2. Implemented Google Analytics for data tracking across multiple websites. Designed dynamic, responsive landing pages with React, NextJS, and Tailwind CSS, and translated Figma designs into interactive websites. Built complex web applications using React, Vite, and Redux Toolkit for advanced state management and side effects.

projects.name: Aura Series API
projects.description: API for Aura Series, a social media platform for sharing and discovering new series, with search and recommendation features.

projects.name: Personal Blog
projects.description: My personal blog where I share my experiences and knowledge about web development, productivity and other interesting topics.

projects.name: JB Baseball Game
projects.description: A baseball game simulator, which allow you to mark all the plays available in a baseball game and save a record of the players' plays.
